Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: The Complete Guide to Amazon’s Private Label Brands | Pattern
s: Similarly to private label brands we see in brick-and-mortar stores, Amazon brands often create products similar to name-brand best-sellers on the site and sell them for a low price. Amazon bills its products as high-quality and lists them at some of the lowest prices online.
